customer.id.description: The unique ID of the customer.

customer.descriptive_name.description: The name or description of the customer.

campaign.id.description: The ID of the campaign the keyword belongs to.

ad_group.id.description: The ID of the ad group the keyword belongs to.

ad_group_criterion.type.description: The type of the ad group criterion (e.g., keyword, placement).

ad_group_criterion.keyword.text.description: The actual text of the keyword.

ad_group_criterion.negative.description: Specifies whether the keyword is a negative keyword.

ad_group_criterion.keyword.match_type.description: The match type of the keyword (e.g., exact, broad, phrase).

segments.date.description: The date when the data was recorded.

campaign.bidding_strategy_type.description: The type of bidding strategy used for the campaign.

metrics.conversions.description: The number of conversions attributed to the keyword.

metrics.conversions_value.description: The total value of conversions attributed to the keyword.

metrics.view_through_conversions.description: The number of conversions that occurred after a view of the ad without a click.

ad_group_criterion.criterion_id.description: The unique ID of the ad group criterion.

metrics.conversions_by_conversion_date.description: Conversion date metric for the campaign.

metrics.all_conversions_by_conversion_da.description: Conversion date metric for the ad group.

metrics.all_conversions_value_by_convers.description: Conversion date metric for the ad group, including all conversions.

metrics.value_per_conversions_by_convers.description: Conversion date metric for the ad group, including value per conversion.

metrics.revenue_micros.description: The total revenue generated by the keyword.

metrics.all_conversions.description: Total number of conversions for all campaigns.

metrics.all_conversions_value.description: Total value of conversions for all campaigns.

metrics.conversions_value_by_conversion_.description: Conversion date metric for conversions in the campaign.

metrics.value_per_conversion.description: Average value per conversion in the campaign.
